name: Asiantation
description: An event organized by Asian Pacific American Coalition (APAC) that offers new incoming students an opportunities to get involved in Asian Culture.

name: Capture The Flag
description: Capture the Flag is a tournament hosted by the various APAC organizations to compete in a vigorous sports competition to strengthen bonds and invigorate team and organization spirit.

name: Family Olympiad
description: AAA Families are groups of AAA members to foster strong membership, and in family olympiad, they will compete in a series of relay races and challenging activities to promote bondings and foster strong relationships.

name: Semiformal
description: Semiformal is an AAA social event that takes place first semester to commemorate accomplishments and socialize with members to strengthen relationships.

name: Fashion Show
description: The annual modern and cultural dance performance that promotes AAA, Asians, and Asian American culture and identity that welcomes AAA Alumni to come and watch.

name: MAASU
description: A spring conference organized by the Midwest Asian American Students Union that unites people who are interested in Asian American culture in the Midwest area.

name: AAA Palooza
description: An event showcases a large variety of Asian American talent and culture from students both within and outside the APAC at UIUC.

name: Study Nights
description: Study Nights are frequent casual events hosted by AAA to create a synergistic study atmosphere for students to not only mutually work together but also to socialize and alleviate stress.

name: Taste Of Asia
description: An event hosted by AAA that gathers other APAC organizations to share their culturesâ€™ respective dishes in a giant potluck to advocate cultural awareness.

name: Formal
description: The finale event in which members formally gather to reflect and commemorate the year and happily rejoice with the friendships and familial bondings that were made.
